messages.subject: Dont expect Yahoo to assist with hacked accounts
messages.msgSnippet: To all, I apologize for the unanswered emails if anyone has sent any. My account was hijacked a few months ago, I would like to remind everyone to change your
messages.messageBody:
To all,

I apologize for the unanswered emails if anyone has
sent any. My account was hijacked a few months ago, I
would like to remind everyone to change your passwords
more frequently than I did and dont expect yahoo to
assist you with regaining control of your accounts.
Any personal emails anyone has sent since......ohh
November please send them again.

Bob R

__________________________________________________
Do You Yahoo!?
Tired of spam? Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around
http://mail.yahoo.com
